participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.background: I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything. My hair is very long. I go to a private high school. My mother is a librarian. I play drums in a band.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Friendly and optimistic, always looking for the silver lining.
participant_2.background: I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation. I run for my mom. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.

content.text: What's the best thing that happened to you this week?
I got to see Taylor Swift in concert!
That's awesome! What was your favorite song?
I loved her whole set, but I really loved her performance of "Love Story."
That's a great song! I love her cover of "All Too Well" too.
Me too! I think she's an amazing artist.
What's your favorite thing about her?
I love her songwriting. Her songs are so personal and relatable.
I love the Beatles! They're my favorite band of all time.
I love their music. It's so timeless.
Me too! I could listen to them all day long.
I have a feeling we're going to be friends.
